author: Xbox
description:
In this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're visiting Obsidian Entertainment as they're getting ready to release their awesome action RPG, The Outer Worlds 2. We're diving deep into Arcadia and learning all about each faction's unique and reactive radio stations, including how the original songs, ads, skits, and eccentric DJs all add flavor, feel, guidance, and lore to this story-driven game.

00:00 Introduction
01:07 Walk and talk with Brandon
02:24 What are you most excited for players to experience?
03:04 What is Outer Worlds 2?
04:19 Sitting down with Leonard and Brandon
05:00 What does it mean to be a Creative Director?
06:56 Radio talk and the inspiration to have it in the game
08:51 What are some of the radio stations?
10:56 What was it like playing the game internally and interpreting the propaganda of each radio station?
12:20 What was the writing and casting process for the radio DJs?
14:20 Reactivity with the radio stations
18:54 The conversational Moon Man Menu
21:2
title: The Outer Worlds 2: Fanatical Factions and Reactive Radios | Official Xbox Podcast

author: Xbox
description:
Awaken from a century-long slumber as the Nomad, an elder vampire new to the modern nights, in Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 where visceral vampire action meets a neo-noir murder mystery. Navigate the vampire court of Seattle and its dark secrets in this action RPG, realized by the BAFTA award-winning studio The Chinese Room.

Step into the World of Darkness as the elder vampire Phyre or Malkavian detective Fabien. Unravel mysteries, manoeuvre Kindred politics, and confront the blurred line between truth and delusion.

Will you be an asset to Seattle, or the spark that burns it all down again? 

Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is now available on XBOX X|S.  

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/vampire-the-masquerade-bloodlines-2/9pf9rkwb9b50

author: Xbox
description:
The gates of Purgatory have blown wide open, and Azazel's dark armies fester at its very heart. It's up to you to blast your way through his demonic hordes and face his grotesque children, the Nephilim. 

🤝 Champions Unite
Choose from four distinct Champions with unique perks and embark on a violent quest for redemption. Watch each other’s backs, and leave nothing standing.

🏰 Halls of the Damned
Fight your way across multiple levels spread across three brutal biomes. Many terrors await you, from countless swarming demons to towering Nephilim, each hellbent on your destruction. 

⚖ Judgement's Tools
Arm yourselves and choose from an arsenal of seven devastating weapons. Whether you're looking to spray, slice, pierce, or obliterate, our armory has you covered. 

🃏 Fury and Fortune
Upgrade your armaments with frightening elemental fury and equip Tarot cards to converge, power up, and maximize your team's abilities.

🎲 Trials of the Damned
Enter a new realm of Purgatory in Rogue Angel mo
title: Painkiller - Launch Trailer
